testcase.classname: To Validated CheckOut product in EuroHike website
testcase.name: Verify the User should navigat to Checkout page after click Checkout securely
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch GC Browser and load the eurohike URL and maximize..passed Given User Should Click the Tents and camping option in home page...........passed When Click the Sleeping category............................................passed And click the Sleeping mats product.........................................passed And Select any one product and click the product............................passed And Add the Quantity base on Test data in Quantity option...................passed And Click the Add to basket button..........................................passed And Scroll down the page and click Checkout securely button in basket page..passed Then User should navigate to the CheckOut page..............................passed
